item.title: For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Design Winners Announced!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Hello once more Vocaloid fans! We are thrilled to announce the winners of the Hatsune Miku “Globe Challenge” held by For Fans By Fans, with designs being sold on the website as of May 26, 2021! All sales on designs support the original creators. Link provided here! So let’s take a look at the “Globe …

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Design Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello once more Vocaloid fans! We are thrilled to announce the winners of the Hatsune Miku “Globe Challenge” held by For Fans By Fans, with designs being sold on the website as of May 26, 2021!

All sales on designs support the original creators. Link provided here!

So let’s take a look at the “Globe Challenge” winners!

Grand Prize Winner: Miku World by Calicocat

Runner Up Winner: “The World Created By Hatsune Miku” By 氷菓子(カナ)

Runner Up Winner: “World Star” by Kengabr

Many congratulations are in order to the winners of the contest as well as everyone who has participated in the event! As always, please show these creators your love and support to their designs and take a look at the entire For Fans by Fans Hatsune Miku collection while you’re at it!

http://bit.ly/VNN_GLOBE

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Design Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Kaomoji x Miku Expo 2021 Online Collaboration
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Coming in preparation for Miku Expo 2021 Online, Kaomoji has announced their new product line made in collaboration with Miku Expo for this event! They’ve collaborated with other big names such as Doki Doki Literature Club, Hatsune Miku, and Kizuna AI since establishing in September 2015. They will be offering custom-made art in celebration of …

The post Kaomoji x Miku Expo 2021 Online Collaboration appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Coming in preparation for Miku Expo 2021 Online, Kaomoji has announced their new product line made in collaboration with Miku Expo for this event! They’ve collaborated with other big names such as Doki Doki Literature Club, Hatsune Miku, and Kizuna AI since establishing in September 2015.

They will be offering custom-made art in celebration of Miku Expo 2021 Online, printed on and available as a sweater or a t-shirt. Please note that this will be a limited run so make sure to grab yours before they run out!

Notably, while this merchandise will ship worldwide, fans in Europe have an added bonus of lower shipping costs as Kaomoji is based in the Netherlands. It’s certainly a lot cheaper than importing from Japan!

Prices

Miku Expo 2021 Online T-Shirt Black (XS/S/M/L/XL/XXL/3XL) – €29,95
Miku Expo 2021 Online Sweater Black (S/M/L/XL/XXL) – €59,95

You can check out the details on this lovely collaboration on their website: https://www.kaomoji.co/pages/miku-expo-2021-x-kaomoji and subscribe to get notified on the merchandise release! Pre-orders open on March 26th so be prepared!

The post Kaomoji x Miku Expo 2021 Online Collaboration appeared first on VNN.

item.title: For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Challenge!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
We are excited to announce that For Fans By Fans have partnered along Miku Expo to celebrate Miku Expo Online this year with a Fan Forge Challenge! The theme represented will be “GLOBE”. If you’re looking to participate, you’ll have the chance to win many rewards! GLOBE Challenge Guidelines You must be 18 years or …

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Challenge! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We are excited to announce that For Fans By Fans have partnered along Miku Expo to celebrate Miku Expo Online this year with a Fan Forge Challenge! The theme represented will be “GLOBE”. If you’re looking to participate, you’ll have the chance to win many rewards!

GLOBE Challenge Guidelines

You must be 18 years or older or have a guardian’s permission to participate. Submissions are open to all countries.

Your task is to design something original and creative inspired by any of the official Piapro characters – “Hatsune Miku”, “Kagamine Rin”, “Kagamine Len”, “Megurine Luka”, “KAITO”, and “MEIKO”.

Mash-ups or cross-overs are not permitted, and you are not allowed to submit any overtly sexual designs.

Your own take on costumes is encouraged but you are not to use costumes made by other artists in the community.

Prizes!

The Grand Prize winner will receive a Snow Miku Nendoroid, a set of For Fans By Fans’ adorable Record Scratcher pins and a DX Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media.

The Runner-Up Prize winners will receive a set of For Fans By Fans’ Record Scratcher pins and a Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media.

Also, all prize winners will get a commission on all sales of their design work!

If you are interested in joining the contest to submit your entry, checking the guidelines, or finding out more about Fan Forge, please check out http://bit.ly/MIKUEXPO-GLOBE! We hope to see all your amazing entries in this contest and a best of luck to you who submit your design!

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Expo 2021 Online Fan Forge Challenge! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “MIKU EXPO 2020” USA & Canada Tour Ticket Refund Information
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hi everyone! We’re here to bring you up to speed with the latest news regarding the ticket refunds for the postponed “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour“ due to the COVID-19 virus. Crypton Future Media made an official announcement today via the official MIKU EXPO Twitter account where they started by profusely apologizing due …

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020” USA & Canada Tour Ticket Refund Information appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone!

We’re here to bring you up to speed with the latest news regarding the ticket refunds for the postponed “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour“ due to the COVID-19 virus.

Crypton Future Media made an official announcement today via the official MIKU EXPO Twitter account where they started by profusely apologizing due to some unforeseen issues with the issuance of refunds for the tickets.

You can read the full statement below:

Don’t forget that the MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour was postponed for September-October 2020 from its original date in April due to the expanding pandemic of the feared COVID-19.

Sources

MIKU EXPO on Twitter

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020” USA & Canada Tour Ticket Refund Information appeared first on VNN.

item.title: MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour New Dates Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
New dates for the MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada tour have been finally announced after being postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Hatsune Miku’s appearance in Coachella, one of the largest music festivals in the United States, which has been postponed due to the spread of the new disease Coronavirus (COVID-19) has been rescheduled as …

The post MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour New Dates Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
New dates for the MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada tour have been finally announced after being postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Hatsune Miku’s appearance in Coachella, one of the largest music festivals in the United States, which has been postponed due to the spread of the new disease Coronavirus (COVID-19) has been rescheduled as well.

All tickets already purchased will be honored for the rescheduled dates. 

MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada new tour dates are as follows:

Be advised that because of how fast the new disease spreads, and this is from the official source, these events could be postponed again to ensure the health and safety of all attendees if the situation with COVID-19 worsens in the coming months.

We hope that everybody will try their best to prevent the spread of the infection by thoroughly washing their hands and following all recommended instructions.

Links

HATSUNE MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada Official Website (English)

HATSUNE MIKU EXPO Official Twitter Account (English)

The post MIKUEXPO 2020 USA & Canada Tour New Dates Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “MIKU EXPO 2020” USA & CANADA Tour Has Been Postponed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Following an official announcement, the official MIKU EXPO 2020 Twitter account has released a statement confirming that the MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada tour has been postponed due to the coronavirus outbreak that’s affecting countries and territories across the world. Following recent developments and in consideration of the safety and well-being of Miku's fans …

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020” USA & CANADA Tour Has Been Postponed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Following an official announcement, the official MIKU EXPO 2020 Twitter account has released a statement confirming that the MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada tour has been postponed due to the coronavirus outbreak that’s affecting countries and territories across the world.

Following recent developments and in consideration of the safety and well-being of Miku's fans and touring staff amidst the COVID-19 outbreak, #MIKUEXPO2020 USA & Canada is in the process of being rescheduled. https://t.co/dOxO6KY4N0 pic.twitter.com/NfSDfgGx3F

— MIKU EXPO 2020 (@mikuexpo) March 12, 2020

The news do not come as a surprise following the suspension of the Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour, the Yomiuri Land events and many more that will surely follow.

It is indeed a sad day for Miku fans but the new dates should be announced pretty soon, hopefully!

Sources

Miku Expo USA & Canada Official Website

Miku Expo Official on Twitter

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020” USA & CANADA Tour Has Been Postponed! appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:

Check out their website and the Hatsune Miku Fan Forge community designs here!

Some of the designs are available below:

That’s not all of it!

If you’re thinking of purchasing some the new cool merchandise then maek sure to use code MIKU2020 at checkout to save 20% on Hatsune Miku merchandise until March 17, 2020 @ 11:59 PM PST!

All of the featured products are designed by Hatsune Miku fans and artists that will receive a commission on every sale of their work. Make sure to support them by purchasing their work!

The theme used for this contest was “Rock“, which brought together artists from all over the globe to send in their best designs of our beloved …

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada” Illustration Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The winners of the “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada” illustration contest at “For Fans by Fans” (formerly WeLoveFine), which was introduced in a recent blog post, have been officially announced!

The theme used for this contest was “Rock“, which brought together artists from all over the globe to send in their best designs of our beloved Hatsune Miku to have a chance at winning amazing prizes!

All of the winners can be found below:

Grand Prix (1st Place)

 

Second Grand Prix (2nd Place)

 

To the Beat of 2020 by Lucas Prokopowich

And for the honorable mentions:

MIKU EXPO Awards

 

 

 

The award-winning illustrations will be sold online around mid March 2020 as tour official collaboration merchandise!

Sources

HATSUNE MIKU 2020 USA & Canada Official Website (English)

HATSUNE MIKU EXPO Official Twitter Account (English)

The post “MIKU EXPO 2020 USA & Canada” Illustration Contest Winners Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku “Digital Stars” 2020 Japan Tour Line-up Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
It’s been quite the week for all things VOCALOID, and Hatsune Miku couldn’t be the exception to that rule, following an official announcement made by the guys at Miku Expo Japan regarding the Hatsune Miku “Digital Stars” 2020 Japan Tour in Fukuoka and its artist line-up. For those that don’t know, “Digital Stars” is a …

The post Hatsune Miku “Digital Stars” 2020 Japan Tour Line-up Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s been quite the week for all things VOCALOID, and Hatsune Miku couldn’t be the exception to that rule, following an official announcement made by the guys at Miku Expo Japan regarding the Hatsune Miku “Digital Stars” 2020 Japan Tour in Fukuoka and its artist line-up.

For those that don’t know, “Digital Stars” is a club event centered on local DJs and creators who are actively influenced by the creative culture of the Internet, including Hatsune Miku.

To date, several sub-events for “MIKU EXPO” have taken place around the world like in Seattle (2016), San Francisco (2016), Los Angeles (2016, 2018), New York (2016, 2018), Taipei (2019), and Hong Kong (2019). In 2020, the next city will be Berlin.

Artists

The artist line-up, DJs and invited special guests have been announced for the Hatsune Miku “Digital Stars” 2020 Japan Tour in Fukuoka and here at VNN we’ll be showing you who those are up next!

  • 八王子P (Hachioji P) & yuzen (BlueStar Remix)
  • Clean Tears (ラッキー★オーブ  aka Lucky ★ Orb Remix)
  • Virtual Cat (バーチャルねこ) (Decade Remix)
  • ｈaｒu & PicoPico Hammer (Local DJs)

Show Information

The following information has been announced:

  • Venue: Livehouse & Club PEACE (1-9-22 Arato, Chuo-ku, Fukuoka City)
  • Date: May 17, 2020 @ 15:00 PM JPT
  • Ticket price: ¥ $3,500 (Info here)

More events are to be held in Osaka and Tokyo on May 22 and 23 respectively (amHALL in Osaka and SOUND MUSEUM VISION in Tokyo), and more information will be revealed tomorrow so stay tuned with us!

Sources

MikuExpo JP on Twitter

HATSUNE MIKU Digital Stars 2020 Japan Tour Official Website

The post Hatsune Miku “Digital Stars” 2020 Japan Tour Line-up Announced! appeared first on VNN.

A new Miku figure has just opened for pre-orders and she is lovely! This time, the figure is “Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver.” and is a 1/8th scale. The figure is by Alphamax and the illustration was done by Ordan. Pre-orders CDJapan Price: 18,236 Yen You can pre-order the figure …

The post Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver. Pre-orders appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new Miku figure has just opened for pre-orders and she is lovely! This time, the figure is “Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver.” and is a 1/8th scale. The figure is by Alphamax and the illustration was done by Ordan.

Pre-orders

CDJapan

Price: 18,236 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on CD Japan here!

AmiAmi

Price: 19,230 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on AmiAmi here!

Hobby Search

Price: 17,860 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on Hobby Search here!

Alphamax

Price: 18,800 Yen
You can pre-order the figure on Alphamx here!

The figure is set to release in October 2020.

We are definitely excited to see this figure on release!

 

The post Hatsune Miku, MIKU EXPO 2019 Taiwan & Hong Kong Ver. Pre-orders appeared first on VNN.
